title: Crushed potatoes with dill
description: This rustic potato recipe is quick and easy to make, and the ideal side dish to serve with fish

method.Step 1: Cook the potatoes in a pan of boiling salted water for 15 minutes or until tender.

method.Step 2: Drain well, return to the pan and gently crush against the side of the pan with the back of a fork.

method.Step 3: Season, add the butter and dill and turn over gently until well mixed.
